objects.name: Replace legitimate binary with malware
objects.description: Replacing a legitimate binary with malware can be accomplished either by replacing a binary on a legitimate download site or standing up a fake or alternative site with the malicious binary. The intent is to have a user download and run the malicious binary thereby executing malware. (Citation: FSecureICS)

external_references.description: Daavid and Antti. (2014, June 23). Havex Hunts For ICS/SCADA Systems. Retrieved March 9, 2017.
